SourceText: Time for some fun! 🤸🏾 Let's play together!
text: Tyd vir 'n bietjie pret! 🤸🏾 Kom ons speel saam!

SourceText: Tell me a bit about your child so I can share the best play ideas for you! 🎲✨
text: Vertel my 'n bietjie meer van jou kind sodat ek die beste speletjies-idees met jou kan deel! 🎲✨

SourceText: Tap 'Let’s Play!' and I’ll share a simple, fun, and free activity you can do together!
text: Klik op "Kom ons Speel!" en ek deel 'n eenvoudige en gratis pretaktiwiteit wat julle saam kan doen!

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
text: Jammer, ek verstaan nie wat jy bedoel nie.

SourceText: See you next time! You can message {PLAY} whenever you would like another easy and fun play idea.
text: Sien jou volgende keer! Jy kan 'n boodskap met die woord {PLAY} stuur wanneer jy ook al nog 'n maklike en prettige speel-idee wil hê.

SourceText: I can do more than just play! 🎉 In this chat, you can also get ParentText.
text: Ek kan meer doen as net speel! 🎉 In hierdie geselstoepassing kan jy ook ParentText kry.

SourceText: ParentText can help you improve your relationship with your child in just 5 days—totally free!
text: ParentText kan jou help om jou verhouding met jou kind in slegs 5 dae te verbeter—geheel en al gratis!

SourceText: Want to give it a try?
That's okay. If you change your mind, you can always message {PLAY} if you want another activity or {START} if you want to start the programme.
text: Alles reg! As jy van plan verander, kan jy te eniger tyd die woord {PLAY} stuur as jy nog 'n aktiwiteit wil hê, of {START} as jy die program wil begin.

SourceText: You entered @results.number. Please enter a number between 0 and 17.
text: Jy het @results.number ingetik. Tik asseblief 'n getal tussen 0 en 17 in.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You entered @results.number. This looks too old. Please enter a number between 0 and 17.
text: Jy het @results.number ingetik. Dit lyk te oud. Tik asseblief 'n getal tussen 0 en 17 in.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.  Please enter a number between 0 and 17.
text: Jammer, ek verstaan nie wat jy bedoel nie. Tik asseblief 'n getal tussen 0 en 17 in.

SourceText: What language works best for you?
text: Watter taal werk die beste vir jou?

SourceText: Quick question for you! 🤔 What are the benefits of play?
text: 'n Vinnige vraag vir jou! 🤔 Wat is die voordele van speel?

SourceText: Absolutely! Play is fun – and it also helps your child grow and supports both your mental health and your child’s.
text: Absoluut! Speel is pret – en dit help jou kind om te groei en ondersteun beide jou en jou kind se geestesgesondheid.

SourceText: Want to learn more? Complete the full survey here: {IOGT link}
text: Wil jy meer uitvind? Voltooi die volledige vraelys hier: {IOGT link}

SourceText: Yes! Play can boost your mood and reduce stress – and it also encourages your child’s development in ways that are fun for you both.
text: Ja! Speel kan jou bui verbeter en stres verlig – en dit bevorder ook jou kind se ontwikkeling op maniere wat vir julle albei pret is.

SourceText: That’s right! Play builds important life skills – and it also supports emotional wellbeing for both you and your child in a fun way.
text: Dis reg! Speel bou belangrike lewensvaardighede – en dit ondersteun ook emosionele welstand vir beide jou en jou kind op 'n prettige manier.

SourceText: Exactly! Play is fun, it supports mental health, and it helps your child grow – all at the same time. Everyone wins!
text: Presies! Speel is pret, dit ondersteun geestesgesondheid, en dit help jou kind groei – alles tegelykertyd. Almal wen!
Ek verstaan nie jou boodskap nie.

SourceText: Message {PLAY} to get a simple, fun activity that you can do with your child. 🤸🏾
text: Stuur {PLAY} om 'n eenvoudige, prettige aktiwiteit te kry wat jy met jou kind kan doen. 🤸🏾

SourceText: In this chat, you can also get ParentText. ParentText can help you improve your relationship with your child in just 5 days—totally free.
text: In hierdie gesprek kan jy ook ParentText kry. ParentText kan jou help om jou verhouding met jou kind in slegs 5 dae te verbeter—geheel en al gratis.

note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument
This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: Let's try an activity for a different age!
text: Kom ons probeer 'n aktiwiteit vir 'n ander ouderdom!
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: Learn more tips to support my child
text: Kry meer wenke om my kind te ondersteun
